structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Actual Working Hours Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of actual working hours categories including specific hour ranges and statistical groupings for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Less than 35 hours
structure:Code.common:Description: Actual working hours less than 35 hours per week.

structure:Code.common:Name: More than 35 hours
structure:Code.common:Description: Actual working hours exceeding 35 hours per week.

structure:Code.common:Name: Hour group A
structure:Code.common:Description: Statistical grouping A for actual working hours classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: Hour group B
structure:Code.common:Description: Statistical grouping B for actual working hours classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: Hour group 35+
structure:Code.common:Description: Statistical grouping for actual working hours of 35 or more hours per week.

structure:Code.common:Name: Average number of hours
structure:Code.common:Description: Statistical measure representing the average actual working hours across the dataset.
